description: Associates a trial component with a trial. A trial component can be associated with multiple trials. To disassociate a trial component from a trial, call the DisassociateTrialComponent API.

parameters.name: TrialComponentName
parameters.description: The name of the component to associated with the trial.

parameters.name: TrialName
parameters.description: The name of the trial to associate with.

nested_items.name: TrialComponentArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trial component.

nested_items.name: TrialArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the trial.
